# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(M3D_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(M3D)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
M3DPluginInfo.C
M3DCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
M3DPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
M3DMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtM3DFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
M3DEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtM3DFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${HDF5_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF5_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IM3DDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IM3DDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IM3DDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MM3DDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MM3DDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MM3DDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MM3DDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EM3DDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EM3DDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EM3DDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EM3DDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EM3DDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EM3DDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EM3DDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EM3DDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases M3D ${INSTALLTARGETS})
